select * FROM `news` WHERE `defunct`!='Y'ORDER BY `importance` ASC,`time` DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date(in_date))*1000 md,count(1) c FROM (select * from solution order by solution_id desc limit 8000) solution where result<13 group by md order by md desc limit 200
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date(in_date))*1000 md,count(1) c FROM (select * from solution order by solution_id desc limit 8000) solution where result=4 group by md order by md desc limit 200
